title: OOM error while using similar gpu pretrained model
body:
so im getting this error while im running my own pretrain model, is there any suggestion on what settings should i put, so i will not get the oom error, i know that this gpu is not good, it has 6gb vram but is there any setting that, will be good for results(quality) and also not prompt me with oom ?

i also tried a pretrained model of an other user but again i got the error, the thing is that the pretrained model was created with the 1060 6 gb which is way worse gpu than mine, and it has the same vram.

**this is the users one and bellow its mine** 
================= Model Summary =================
==                                             ==
==            Model name: 1_SAEHD              ==
==                                             ==
==     Current iteration: 750000               ==
==                                             ==
==--------------- Model Options ---------------==
==                                             ==
==            resolution: 256                  ==
==             face_type: wf                   ==
==     models_opt_on_gpu: True                 ==
==                 archi: df-ud                ==
==               ae_dims: 292                  ==
==                e_dims: 92                   ==
==                d_dims: 92                   ==
==           d_mask_dims: 16                   ==
==       masked_training: True                 ==
==             eyes_prio: False                ==
==           uniform_yaw: True                 ==
==            lr_dropout: n                    ==
==           random_warp: False                ==
==             gan_power: 0.0                  ==
==       true_face_power: 0.0                  ==
==      face_style_power: 0.0                  ==
==        bg_style_power: 0.0                  ==
==               ct_mode: none                 ==
==              clipgrad: False                ==
==              pretrain: True                 ==
==       autobackup_hour: 1                    ==
== write_preview_history: False                ==
==           target_iter: 750000               ==
==           random_flip: False                ==
==            batch_size: 7                    ==
==                                             ==
==---------------- Running On -----------------==
==                                             ==
==          Device index: 0                    ==
==                  Name: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB ==
==                  VRAM: 5.93GB               ==
==                                             ==
=================================================
